You’re still at it?\""},{"lineNumber":51438,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は……そうなります、な。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes... that’s how it is."},{"lineNumber":51439,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なにせ堅固でして…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's very solid after all...\""},{"lineNumber":51440,"originalJapaneseLine":"退屈そうに紅茶を嗜む魔人メディウサに、","translatedEnglishLine":"To Medusa the demon, who was sipping tea looking bored,"},{"lineNumber":51441,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ツォトンは、汗顔の態で頭を下げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster General Tsoton bowed his head, sweating with embarrassment."},{"lineNumber":51442,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あらゆるものを閉じ込める、永久地下牢……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A permanent underground prison that traps everything..."},{"lineNumber":51443,"originalJapaneseLine":"　完全な防衛を企図した、厄介な場所です」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s a troublesome place designed for complete defense.\""},{"lineNumber":51444,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あたしはほら、どっちでもいいんだけどさ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I don’t really care either way."},{"lineNumber":51445,"originalJapaneseLine":"　捕まってる、モノがモノじゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":"But the things caught there aren’t just ordinary things.\""},{"lineNumber":51446,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………っ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"..........!\""},{"lineNumber":51447,"originalJapaneseLine":"ツォトンはぞくりと背中を震わせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tsoton shuddered down his spine."},{"lineNumber":51448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人……カミーラ、様…………","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Demon... Kamira-sama..."},{"lineNumber":51449,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼス陥落より優先せよとのお達し、ですな……","translatedEnglishLine":"We have orders to prioritize this over the fall of Zeth..."},{"lineNumber":51450,"originalJapaneseLine":"　重々、承知しております」","translatedEnglishLine":"I fully understand.\""},{"lineNumber":51451,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっはは。ケーちゃんも一途よねぇ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahaha. Kei-chan is devoted, isn’t she."},{"lineNumber":51452,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっち方面だけ、兵数が他の二倍以上だもの」","translatedEnglishLine":"On this front alone, we have more than twice the number of troops than the other two."},{"lineNumber":51453,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あたしはラクそうだからこっち来たけど。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I came here because it seemed easier,"},{"lineNumber":51454,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……失敗した、じゃ通らないと思うよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"but I don’t think ‘I made a mistake’ will be accepted.\""},{"lineNumber":51455,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は………………それはもう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes... that is already...\""},{"lineNumber":51456,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサにおもねるわけでもなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Without flattering Medusa,"},{"lineNumber":51457,"originalJapaneseLine":"ツォトンは神妙に頷いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tsoton nodded solemnly."},{"lineNumber":51458,"originalJapaneseLine":"「愛しのカカカさん、だもんねぇ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because it’s dear Kakaka-san, after all."},{"lineNumber":51459,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっと、どんな手を使ってでも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Surely, she’ll use whatever means necessary...\""},{"lineNumber":51460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………って。さっきからなに、この音」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hey. What’s that sound just now?\""},{"lineNumber":51461,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて……地震、でもなさそうですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now then... it doesn’t seem like an earthquake though...\""},{"lineNumber":51462,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん〜？　ここかあぁ、メディウサァァ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? It’s here! Medusa!\""},{"lineNumber":51463,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨大な影が、メディウサの部屋に押し入ってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"A huge shadow barged into Medusa’s room."},{"lineNumber":51464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………げっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................ Ugh!\""},{"lineNumber":51465,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラグナロックアーク地下、永久地下牢――","translatedEnglishLine":"Lagnaroak Ark underground, permanent underground prison—"},{"lineNumber":51466,"originalJapaneseLine":"「撃て！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fire!\""},{"lineNumber":51467,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げぶっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gehp!\""},{"lineNumber":51468,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐえええええっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gueeeeeh!\""},{"lineNumber":51469,"originalJapaneseLine":"光魔法の奔流の中に、魔軍の尖兵達が呑まれていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"The vanguard of the demon army was swallowed by the torrent of light magic."},{"lineNumber":51470,"originalJapaneseLine":"「第一部隊、下がって！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"First unit, fall back!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かりました」
「それと。秘め事を他人に話されるのも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, I do not like having my secrets told to others."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は好きではないです」
ランスは壊れた人形の様に、繰り返し頷いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance nodded repeatedly like a broken doll.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おお……や、やはり、おっかない……」
「では……ハニーキング。
ハニー達の配置について、相談しましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's discuss the deployment of the Hannies."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザはハニーキングを引きずるようにして、
玉座の間を後にした。
ハニーキング率いるハニー軍団が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Hanny Corps led by Hanny King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類軍に加わった。
ゼス、王都ラグナロックアーク――
「……で。まぁだやってるわけ？」
「は……そうなります、な。
なにせ堅固でして…………」
退屈そうに紅茶を嗜む魔人メディウサに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To Medusa the demon, who was sipping tea looking bored,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ツォトンは、汗顔の態で頭を下げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster General Tsoton bowed his head, sweating with embarrassment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あらゆるものを閉じ込める、永久地下牢……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A permanent underground prison that traps everything...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完全な防衛を企図した、厄介な場所です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s a troublesome place designed for complete defense."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あたしはほら、どっちでもいいんだけどさ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I don’t really care either way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕まってる、モノがモノじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the things caught there aren’t just ordinary things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンはぞくりと背中を震わせた。
「魔人……カミーラ、様…………
ゼス陥落より優先せよとのお達し、ですな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have orders to prioritize this over the fall of Zeth...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重々、承知しております」
「あっはは。ケーちゃんも一途よねぇ。
こっち方面だけ、兵数が他の二倍以上だもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On this front alone, we have more than twice the number of troops than the other two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あたしはラクそうだからこっち来たけど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I came here because it seemed easier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……失敗した、じゃ通らないと思うよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I don’t think ‘I made a mistake’ will be accepted."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサにおもねるわけでもなく、
ツォトンは神妙に頷いた。
「愛しのカカカさん、だもんねぇ。
きっと、どんな手を使ってでも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surely, she’ll use whatever means necessary..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………って。さっきからなに、この音」
「さて……地震、でもなさそうですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then... it doesn’t seem like an earthquake though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん〜？　ここかあぁ、メディウサァァ！」
巨大な影が、メディウサの部屋に押し入ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A huge shadow barged into Medusa’s room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアーク地下、永久地下牢――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lagnaroak Ark underground, permanent underground prison—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「撃て！」
「げぶっ！」
「ぐえええええっ！」
光魔法の奔流の中に、魔軍の尖兵達が呑まれていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The vanguard of the demon army was swallowed by the torrent of light magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「第一部隊、下がって！

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
